name: Captain Flamethrower visits the Children's Hospital
name_original: Captain Flamethrower visits the Children's Hospital
description:
Title pretty much sums it up. Non-download, play in browser flash game that I made in like 4 days for a contest. The theme was "Burning". Can't imagine why they didn't like it.

Run around spraying sick kids with flames. Go for 100% burn bonus ( that means torch everything )

Suits
